description:
Updates : Join Over 1500 Delighted Students On This Amazing Course!

The secret to getting ahead is to get started

This course is designed for non-programmers who are willing to make dynamic websites either in any field. In this course we are going to make an e-commerce site using wordpress and for this you have not to write a single code. Wordpress provides us GUI to work which everyone can handle easily. Either you want to build your own site or for your client, wordpress can save a lot time & money that you spent on building & maintaining your website.

Now a days wordpress is becoming very popular because of it's awesome features. Every day many themes & plugins are introduced which make wordpress very reliable to use & build dynamic websites. If we go back to few years before, wordpress was just blogging tool but now that's not true. It's the most popular CMS of the world.

This course is designed for everyone i.e. from beginner to advance. We have covered all topics from scratch & assumed that you have not any experience in html, css or in any programming language.

Okay, let us explain why to take this course while there are many Wordpress courses in less prices.

  • While designing this course we have analyzed individual's problems & needs. Everyone faces a lot of problems which are so general that it becomes difficult to find their solution. So we have taken care of your problems & needs so that you have not to look for youtube videos, other websites, asking for help again & again etc.
  • Course is designed in such a way that you will be able to handle any theme. You will be able to make any protfolio site, any business site, any blog and can use any site for e-commerce purpose in just few clicks.
  • Shortcodes, editor, HTML mode of pages & handling core files using FTP are expined well so that you will able to handle multiple wordpress sites.


We commend that you will get value content for your each penny. If you face any problem, we are always here to help you.

.
title: Making E-Commerce Sites With Wordpress
